commands.name: az palo-alto cloudngfw local-rulestack local-rule create
commands.syntax:
az palo-alto cloudngfw local-rulestack local-rule create --local-rulestack-name
                                                         --priority
                                                         --resource-group
                                                         --rule-name
                                                         [--action-type {Allow, DenyResetBoth, DenyResetServer, DenySilent}]
                                                         [--applications]
                                                         [--audit-comment]
                                                         [--category]
                                                         [--decryption-rule-type {None, SSLInboundInspection, SSLOutboundInspection}]
                                                         [--description]
                                                         [--destination]
                                                         [--enable-logging {DISABLED, ENABLED}]
                                                         [--etag]
                                                         [--inbound-certificate]
                                                         [--negate-destination {FALSE, TRUE}]
                                                         [--negate-source {FALSE, TRUE}]
                                                         [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                         [--protocol]
                                                         [--protocol-port-list]
                                                         [--rule-state {DISABLED, ENABLED}]
                                                         [--source]
                                                         [--tags]
examples: az palo-alto cloudngfw local-rulestack local-rule create -g MyResourceGroup --local-rulestack-name MyLocalRulestacks --rule-name MyLocalRule --priority "1" --action-type "Allow" --enable-logging "DISABLED" --rule-state "DISABLED"

commands.name: az palo-alto cloudngfw local-rulestack local-rule delete
commands.syntax:
az palo-alto cloudngfw local-rulestack local-rule delete [--ids]
                                                         [--local-rulestack-name]
                                                         [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                         [--priority]
                                                         [--resource-group]
                                                         [--subscription]
examples: az palo-alto cloudngfw local-rulestack local-rule delete -g MyResourceGroup --local-rulestack-name MyLocalRulestacks --priority "1"

commands.name: az palo-alto cloudngfw local-rulestack local-rule list
commands.syntax:
az palo-alto cloudngfw local-rulestack local-rule list --local-rulestack-name
                                                       --resource-group
                                                       [--max-items]
                                                       [--next-token]
examples: az palo-alto cloudngfw local-rulestack local-rule list -g MyResourceGroup --local-rulestack-name MyLocalRulestacks

commands.name: az palo-alto cloudngfw local-rulestack local-rule refresh-counter
commands.syntax:
az palo-alto cloudngfw local-rulestack local-rule refresh-counter [--firewall-name]
                                                                  [--ids]
                                                                  [--local-rulestack-name]
                                                                  [--priority]
                                                                  [--resource-group]
                                                                  [--subscription]
examples: az palo-alto cloudngfw local-rulestack local-rule refresh-counter -g MyResourceGroup --local-rulestack-name MyLocalRulestacks --priority "1"

commands.name: az palo-alto cloudngfw local-rulestack local-rule reset-counter
commands.syntax:
az palo-alto cloudngfw local-rulestack local-rule reset-counter [--firewall-name]
                                                                [--ids]
                                                                [--local-rulestack-name]
                                                                [--priority]
                                                                [--resource-group]
                                                                [--subscription]
examples: az palo-alto cloudngfw local-rulestack local-rule reset-counter -g MyResourceGroup --local-rulestack-name MyLocalRulestacks --priority "1"

commands.name: az palo-alto cloudngfw local-rulestack local-rule show
commands.syntax:
az palo-alto cloudngfw local-rulestack local-rule show [--ids]
                                                       [--local-rulestack-name]
                                                       [--priority]
                                                       [--resource-group]
                                                       [--subscription]
examples: az palo-alto cloudngfw local-rulestack local-rule show -g MyResourceGroup --local-rulestack-name MyLocalRulestacks --priority "1"

commands.name: az palo-alto cloudngfw local-rulestack local-rule show-counter
commands.syntax:
az palo-alto cloudngfw local-rulestack local-rule show-counter [--firewall-name]
                                                               [--ids]
                                                               [--local-rulestack-name]
                                                               [--priority]
                                                               [--resource-group]
                                                               [--subscription]
examples: az palo-alto cloudngfw local-rulestack local-rule get-counter -g MyResourceGroup --local-rulestack-name MyLocalRulestacks --priority "1"

commands.name: az palo-alto cloudngfw local-rulestack local-rule wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
commands.syntax:
az palo-alto cloudngfw local-rulestack local-rule wait [--created]
                                                       [--custom]
                                                       [--deleted]
                                                       [--exists]
                                                       [--ids]
                                                       [--interval]
                                                       [--local-rulestack-name]
                                                       [--priority]
                                                       [--resource-group]
                                                       [--subscription]
                                                       [--timeout]
                                                       [--updated]
